sections.title: Winter Witch (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Winter Witch class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Winter Witch)
sections.description: Winter witches gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Winter Witch)
sections.description: Winter witch levels stack with witch levels for spells per day and patron spells, but grant no other class benefits.

sections.title: Hyperboreal Patronage (Winter Witch)
sections.description: The winter witch's patron gains an icy aspect, adding specific ice-themed spells to her spell list at certain levels.

sections.title: Winter Witchcraft (Winter Witch)
sections.description: Winter witch levels stack with witch levels for determining hex progression, hex effects, familiar abilities, and major/grand hex access.

sections.title: Freeze and Thaw (Su) (Winter Witch)
sections.description: As a standard action, the winter witch can freeze water into ice or melt ice and snow by touch in specific volumes.

sections.title: Unnatural Cold (Su) (Winter Witch)
sections.description: Creatures affected by the winter witch's cold damage abilities are treated as having half their normal cold resistance.

sections.title: Sculpt Ice and Snow (Sp) (Winter Witch)
sections.description: The winter witch can shape ice and snow like stone shape, and at 7th level can fabricate items from ultra-hard ice.

sections.title: Winter Hex (Winter Witch)
sections.description: When choosing major hexes, the winter witch must first select from three specific winter-themed hexes including the new numbing chill hex.

sections.title: Blizzard Sight (Su) (Winter Witch)
sections.description: The winter witch can see normally in all forms of weather conditions including rain, snow, fog, and blizzards.

sections.title: Unearthly Cold (Su) (Winter Witch)
sections.description: Half the cold damage from the winter witch's abilities comes from otherworldly power and bypasses cold resistance and immunity.

sections.title: Iceglide (Su) (Winter Witch)
sections.description: The winter witch can move through ice and snow at base speed without leaving traces, usable 10 minutes per day in 1-minute increments.

sections.title: Inexorable Cold (Su) (Winter Witch)
sections.description: Cold spells gain +1 caster level and bonuses to caster level checks, while becoming harder to counterspell or dispel.
